actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1715.

official_title: A resolution providing for the agreeing to the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 112) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the excise tax on the investment income of private foundations from 4 percent to 2 percent.

summary.text: Expresses the agreement of the House of Representatives to the Senate amendments to H.R. 112 (Amending the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the excise tax on investment income of private foundations from four percent to two percent).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the agreeing to the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 112) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the excise tax on the investment income of private foundations from 4 percent to 2 percent.
